pizza.message

Class SliceOrderItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • pizza.message.OrderItem
      • pizza.message.SliceOrderItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SliceOrderItem
extends OrderItem
    Represents a slice together with zero or more toppings. Also includes a quantity so that a customer can order more than one slice.

    The representation of this object according to PizzaProtocol is

    Item type:slice, Menu id:<menu id>, quantity:<quantity>, toppings:<first topping id> ... <last topping id>

    -- all on a single line.
    Topping ids are separated by a single space. If there are no toppings, the "toppings" keyword is still in the encoding, but is at the end of the line.
    Author:
    drdan
    See Also:
